mean_cn: n. 急促不清的话，胡言乱语；  vi. 急促而不清楚地说，闲聊，啰嗦，喋喋不休地说；  vt. 急促而不清楚地说，胡说八道
mean_en: to talk quickly and in a way that is difficult to understand
short_phrase: gabble all day and put her to sleep
sentence: I wish he would stop gabbling; I can't understand a word he's saying.
sentence_trans: 我希望他能停下胡言乱语，他说的我一个字都听不懂。
